Title: THE BAD GUYS IN LET THE GAMES BEGIN
Author: Aaron Blabey
Description: The 17th book in the Bad Guys series. The wannabe heroes return and a major shift in perception takes place.

Title: HEARTSTOPPER, VOL. 2
Author: Alice Oseman
Description: The second book in the Heartstopper series. Nick discovers things about the people around him, and about himself.

Title: HEARTSTOPPER, VOL. 3
Author: Alice Oseman
Description: The third book in the Heartstopper series. Charlie and Nick learn about the coming-out process as they officially become boyfriends.

Title: TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: THE LAST RONIN
Author: Kevin Eastman, Peter Laird and Tom Waltz
Description: A lone Turtle goes on a mission to get justice for his family in a post-apocalyptic New York. Illustrated by Esau Escorza, Isaac Escorza and Ben Bishop.

Title: HEARTSTOPPER, VOL. 4
Author: Alice Oseman
Description: The fourth book in the Heartstopper series. As the school year starts, Charlie and Nick face challenges of revealing who they are and what they feel.

Title: KAREN'S HAIRCUT
Author: Ann M. Martin.
Description: The seventh book in the Baby-Sitters Little Sister Series. A new haircut adds to Karen’s anxieties.

Title: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S: FAZBEAR FRIGHTS, VOL. 1
Author: Scott Cawthon, Elley Cooper and Carly Anne West.
Description: Three stories adapted into a graphic novel by Christopher Hastings.

Title: COLLABORATIONS
Author: Dav Pilkey
Description: The fourth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. After doing their chores, baby frogs work together to create more mini-comics.

Title: PERSEPOLIS
Author: Marjane Satrapi
Description: A memoir of the author’s life from ages 6 to 14 in Iran, during and after its 1979 revolution, depicted through black-and-white comic strip images.

Title: TEACHER'S PET
Author: Francine Pascal.
Description: The second book in the Sweet Valley Twins graphic novel series. Jessica seeks recognition from her teacher for her dancing. Adapted by Nicole Andelfinger.

Title: BEST FRIENDS
Author: Francine Pascal.
Description: The first book in the Sweet Valley Twins graphic novel series. The twins discover some differences between them as they start middle school. Adapted by Nicole Andelfinger.

Title: JUJUTSU KAISEN, VOL. 1
Author: Gege Akutami
Description: The athletic Yuji Itadori chooses to spend his time with members of the Occult Research Club, who unseal a cursed object.

Title: NO PLAN B
Author: Lee Child and Andrew Child
Description: The 27th book in the Jack Reacher series. Reacher goes after a killer but is unaware of the bigger implications.

Title: THE GIRL WHO SURVIVED
Author: Lisa Jackson
Description: Two decades after a killing spree left her orphaned, Kara McIntyre’s brother, who was imprisoned for the murders, is released.

Title: VINCE FLYNN: OATH OF LOYALTY
Author: Kyle Mills
Description: The 21st book in the Mitch Rapp series. President Cook, a team of assassins and a killer known as Legion confront Rapp on different fronts.

Title: BILLY SUMMERS
Author: Stephen King
Description: A killer for hire who only takes out bad guys seeks redemption as he does one final job.

Title: TOTAL CONTROL
Author: David Baldacci
Description: When a plane carrying an executive at a technology conglomerate crashes into the Virginia countryside, Sidney Archer seeks the truth behind what caused it.

Title: SHADOW DANCE
Author: Christine Feehan
Description: The eighth book in the Shadow Riders series. Geno connects to Amaranthe in the shadows and goes after his parents’ killer.

Title: ENCORE IN DEATH
Author: J.D. Robb
Description: The 56th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates the mysterious death of a well-loved star of stage and screen.

Title: THE HIGH NOTES
Author: Danielle Steel
Description: Beginning at age 12, Iris Cooper endures a number of hardships in hopes of finding success as a singer.

Title: WEATHER THE STORM
Author: Nora Roberts
Description: Two thrillers: “The Welcoming” and “Without a Trace.”

Title: THE PERFECT ASSASSIN
Author: James Patterson and Brian Sitts
Description: The first book in the Doc Savage thriller series. Dr. Brandt Savage goes on sabbatical and winds up in a top-secret training program.

Title: THE BOYS FROM BILOXI
Author: John Grisham
Description: Two childhood friends follow in their fathers’ footsteps, which puts them on opposite sides of the law.

Title: SPARRING PARTNERS
Author: John Grisham
Description: Three novellas: “Homecoming,” “Strawberry Moon” and “Sparring Partners.”

Title: FEAR NO EVIL
Author: James Patterson
Description: The 29th book in the Alex Cross series. Cross fights the mastermind who has stalked him for years.

Title: DISTANT THUNDER
Author: Stuart Woods
Description: The 63rd book in the Stone Barrington series. Further adventures begin when a dead man turns up on Stone’s doorstep.

Title: THAT SUMMER
Author: Jennifer Weiner
Description: Daisy Shoemaker receives emails intended for a woman leading a more glamorous life and finds there was more to this accident.

Title: THE BOY WHO HARNESSED THE WIND
Author: William Kamkwamba and Bryan Mealer.

Title: IF HE HAD BEEN WITH ME
Author: Laura Nowlin

Title: THE WAY I USED TO BE
Author: Amber Smith

Title: THEY BOTH DIE AT THE END
Author: Adam Silvera
